typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory)
literal_string "no balance to transfer to owner"

arguments.value: no balance to transfer to owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "no balance to transfer to owner"

documentation.text:
Registration, advertisement and posting fees are made payable to the contract address.
 The owner will have to withdraw and pay taxes on the earnings from these fees.
 This method permits an authenticated cash out of the contract balance to the contract owner.
 The comment, friend, followers, likes and dislike fees are paid to the originating user at the time
 of the event. The user is responsible for reporting earnings.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory)
function (string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory)
function (string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory)

documentation.text: The contract gets a fee for posting
The post owner gets a fee for all comments added to the post, pays 0.0001 ether per post

When you follow a user, you are sending a small compensation to the user as a thank you.
 User earns 0.0001 ether per each new follower
User earns 0.0001 ether per each new friend request. Only friends can comment on a user's posts
User sends 0.0001 ether to each follower;
User pays small gas fee to change opt-out status

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "consumer has opted-out to received any external messages or communication"

arguments.value: consumer has opted-out to received any external messages or communication

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "consumer has opted-out to received any external messages or communication"

documentation.text:
Permits third party marketers to send messages to consumers via the connected DAPP for a fee paid to a verified consumer.
 Consumer has option to opt-out, if they choose to receive communication, they can now get paid for each message received.
 Since no Personal Identifying Information (PII) is linked to the wallet on the public chain, there is no matching demographics and
 just plain blind advertising which is most email campaigns.

A marketer can buy the consumer list of wallet addresses. No PII is attached and no demographics.
 Though a marketer can query the blockchain for matching transactions and develop their own demographics?
 The next analytic metric?

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addComment(address,uint256,string).notice: The post owner gets a fee for all comments added to the post, pays 0.0001 ether per post

addFollower(address).notice: When you follow a user, you are sending a small compensation to the user as a thank you. User earns 0.0001 ether per each new follower

cashoutToOwner().notice: Registration, advertisement and posting fees are made payable to the contract address. The owner will have to withdraw and pay taxes on the earnings from these fees. This method permits an authenticated cash out of the contract balance to the contract owner. The comment, friend, followers, likes and dislike fees are paid to the originating user at the time of the event. The user is responsible for reporting earnings.

getUserList().notice: A marketer can buy the consumer list of wallet addresses. No PII is attached and no demographics. Though a marketer can query the blockchain for matching transactions and develop their own demographics? The next analytic metric?

makeFriendRequest(address).notice: User earns 0.0001 ether per each new friend request. Only friends can comment on a user's posts

notifyFollowers(string).notice: User sends 0.0001 ether to each follower;

post(uint256,bool,string).notice: The contract gets a fee for posting

sendUserMessage(address,string).notice: Permits third party marketers to send messages to consumers via the connected DAPP for a fee paid to a verified consumer. Consumer has option to opt-out, if they choose to receive communication, they can now get paid for each message received. Since no Personal Identifying Information (PII) is linked to the wallet on the public chain, there is no matching demographics and just plain blind advertising which is most email campaigns.

userChangeOptsOutStatus(address,bool).notice: User pays small gas fee to change opt-out status
